word: Jesus said to him, \93Friend, wherefore art thou come?\94 His voice trembled with sorrow as He added, \93Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?\94 This appeal should have aroused the conscience of the betrayer, and touched his stubborn heart; but honor, fidelity, and human tenderness had forsaken him. He stood bold and defiant, showing no disposition to relent.  Ibid., pp. 693-696. 59
